text:
I'm 4 years late.
After beating this game as a child, this is one of the 3 songs I truly remember from this game as an adult (the other two being the dark star and that mountain where you fight your clones).  You did a great job with this track.

author: sammisomara

text:
Man, I love Secret of Mana.
Adventuring around the world, getting ever stronger, experiencing all kinds of new things, you hop on your dragon and happen upon a city of pure gold.  Despite all the trials and tribulations you've gone through, despite how close the potential end of the world--or at least, civilization, and many, many lives--is, you still find happiness, cheer, and a comfortable place with awesome music where you can buy a duck helm and tiger bikini.

author: Oh Hai

text:
Nice remix, SD!  This is in my top three tracks for Secret of Mana.  

A wish
What the Forest Taught Me
A Curious Tale

I just love this song so much.  Kikuta did an amazing job on this game.  It's such a shame that video game music doesn't get the recognition it deserves from the majority of consumers.  At least gamers are growing up and having kids of their own to keep it going.  We also will hear much less "controversy" from biased news reports like FOX news.
author: SMRPGFAN101

text: I love listening to this tune when it gets really hot for too long and I start longing for crisp weather and golden leaves.  Definitely gets me excited for fall.

author: Twilight Dragmire

text: This is absolutely excellent!  If the only music I could hear for the rest of my life were the music of SoM, I'd be happy.  This is great, love the drums kicking in on the second half!  I actually think if I were to ever be a millionaire, I'd buy out a plot of land and have it remade into one or more of the areas of the game, it's just that incredible.  Or maybe I'm just sick :D
